title: Highest Social Contributions
description: In 2022, social contributions in Germany accounted for 56.03% of total revenue, the highest percentage globally.

title: Longest Secondary Education Duration
description: As of 2023, Germany offers the longest duration of secondary education in the world, lasting 9 years.

title: Lowest Prevalence of Underweight in Females
description: In 2016, only 0.2% of female children under 5 in Germany were underweight, the lowest rate worldwide.

title: Lowest Prevalence of Overweight in Males
description: In 2016, the prevalence of overweight among male children under 5 in Germany was just 0.7%, the lowest globally.

title: Lowest Prevalence of Stunting in Males
description: In 2016, only 0.4% of male children under 5 in Germany were stunted, the lowest rate in the world.

title: Largest Negative Net Capital Account
description: In 2023, Germany had a net capital account balance of -$28.7 billion, the largest negative value globally.
